{{wikipedia|Nanyue}}
{{wikipedia|南越|lang=zh}}

===Etymology===
The qualifier "South" distinguished this kingdom from other "Yue" ("Việt") tribes including the state of [[Yue]] and the realm of the [[Minyue]] ({{zh-l|閩越}}).

# [[Nanyue]], the [[Zhao]] Dynasty's [[successor]] [[state]] to the [[Qin]] Empire in modern-day [[Guangdong]], [[Guangxi]]{{,}} and [[northern]] [[Vietnam]].
